About me

I am a PhD research at KU Leuven, department of Computer science under supervision of Marc Van Barel and Raf Vandebril. My research focusses on structured matrices in the context of rational Krylov subspaces. The study of these matrices can be used to develop numerically stable algorithms for a variety of problems in mathematics.

Research interests

  • Structured matrices
  • Orthogonal polynomials
  • Short recurrence relations
  • Moment problems
  • Biorthogonal Krylov subspace methods
